title: The Castle
occurrences: Because the village belongs to the castle. Nobody may pass the night without permission.
Is there a castle here?
The castle invited me to come here,
You're a guest of the castle.
The castle.
I heard it at the castle.
And who told you at the castle?
Can you get me a sleigh to get up to the castle?
No stranger can get into the castle without permission.
Maybe the castle administration.
Hello, get me the castle administration.
The land surveyor wants to know if he can come with us to the castle.
I want to come to the castle.
We have a message for you from the castle.
Sir, you have been accepted, as you already know, in the official service of the castle.
Aren't you going to the castle now?
No, I'll go to the castle tomorrow.
That big house over there. The gentlemen from the castle eat there when they have business here.
That's impossible, this house is reserved exclusively for gentlemen from the castle.
I have useful connections at the castle.
Are many gentlemen from the castle staying here tonight?
Then you've been to the castle?
How many times have I asked Klamm to leave them at the castle.
The castle doesn't seem to please you.
Have you ever been in the castle?
The castle has confirmed my position as land surveyor.
The castle has confirmed your position as land surveyor.
For you, yes. They have castle authorisation.
You mean because the castle sent you a letter?
However, I'll enquire at the castle.
Since he cannot expedite the final decision which, naturally, rests in the hands of the castle,
If you don't take this post the castle offered you then we'll never find anywhere to go.
In the name of Klamm and of the castle I demand that you answer my questions.
Father gets angry when anyone mentions the castle to him.
just because she was once in the castle.
...the castle administration has been very generous as they always are...
The castle pretends we don't exist.
My sister once refused a castle official who made a definite offer to her.
And for that the castle punished you?
The castle didn't even make a comment.
The people here and at the castle.
The castle story's been told.
Have you never tried to talk to the castle about it?
Finally I made certain connections with the castle.
The letter to you is the first work he's had from the castle.
I spent the whole day at the castle for you.
Just as I was leaving the castle I saw a man walking towards me along the corridor.
He might sleep for hours, then return to the castle.
They all go back to the castle.
the excess amount of work requiring the castle officials' attention,
